attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thereby removing the threat that these vermin pose to our innocent children.

rejection.details:
There are already petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=peadophile
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
